page.title: 09CHILDREN AND YOUTH GROUPS
page.content: The children in the area have the opportunity of becoming members of the {Get Set}or the{Target Club,}depending on age. The clubs are organised by adult members of the church, and provides for two groups of children: aged from{seven to ten,}and{eleven and over, and are based at St. Peter's Hall; the church hall. There is a wide range of indoor and outdoor activities offered throughout the year, and cover such areas as{camping}(when, once a year the children spend a week at a camp site),{mirror dinghy sailing, {canoeing, swimming}and other {watersports.}Other activities are organised during the winter months. {Orienteering, treasure hunts, mini- {marathons for charity fund raising, {art and craft competitions, visits {to places of interest, theatre trips, etc. are enjoyed by the children.
